Photo: James Nielsen, Staff Weights & Measures Where: 2808 Caroline Cost: $$ Opened: January Alison... Image 47 of 47 New kids on the block: Cooking Girl, Fig Pig 1 / 47 Back to Gallery Poor Lee’s Fried Chicken and Donuts . From all accounts, the opening weekend was crazy busy.
Just four days in, they’ve already had dozens of social media reviews . Some not so nice.
From Eric H.’s 2-star Yelp review:
“I'm going to try and keep this short and sweet. I had hopes for Lee's, but those hopes were dashed after the first bite.”
Well, with more than two year’s of hype and a good business track record, expectations can be high.
Sometimes it is best to be under the radar.
Take Cooking Girl . The family-owned restaurant opened quietly in Montrose last month. And if the early reviews are to be believed, the small restaurant’s spicy Szechuan fare is the real deal.
And speaking of openings…
For those who fondly recall the Burger Guys , perhaps a road trip is in order.
Jake Mazzu, one of the original Burger Guys, and partner Nathan Luna opened the Fig Pig today in Beaumont. The soft opening menu featured BG Sliders and Mazzu has promised to put more of the signature BG items on the menu. (I long for a Houston Burger by any other name.)
Cooking Girl : 315 Fairview, 832-382-2941
The Fig Pig : 797 N. 5th in Beaumont, 409-832-3900
Take a look at photos above of Cooking Girl's fare and other restaurants that have opened in 2015.
